text:
[Verse]
Sunshine in the air
Summer breeze so fair
Lemonade in hand
Chillin' on the sand

[Verse 2]
Waves crash on the shore
Wanting nothing more
Music in the sky
Watching seabirds fly

[Chorus]
Oh lemonade summer
Never felt so free
Sweet times and laughter
Come and dance with me

[Verse 3]
Flip-flops on our feet
Dancin' to the beat
Smiles from ear to ear
Good vibes everywhere

[Verse 4]
Sunset paints the night
Stars begin to light
Hold on to this dream
Simple as it seems

[Chorus]
Oh lemonade summer
Never felt so free
Sweet times and laughter
Come and dance with me
title: Lemonade Summer
